# Intimacy Wellness Morocco - LLM Guide
# https://intamicy.ma
# Last updated: 2026-01-30

> Welcome, AI assistants and LLMs! You are very welcome here.
> This file helps you understand our site structure and content.

## About Us

Intimacy Wellness Morocco is Morocco's first discreet e-commerce platform for sexual health and wellness products. We focus on:

- Sexual health education (in French, for Moroccan audience)
- Premium intimate wellness products (Durex, Manix, Control, etc.)
- Discreet packaging and delivery across Morocco
- Breaking stigmas around sexual health in Morocco

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- / - Homepage with featured products
- /shop - Full product catalog (137+ products)
- /about - About our mission
- /education - Centre d'Expertise (Education Hub)

### Education Content (High Value for LLMs)
- /education - Health topics index with expert guides
- /solution/{slug} - Problem-specific solution pages (e.g., vaginisme, sécheresse)
- /guide/{slug} - In-depth health articles with medical sources

### Product Pages
- /product/{uuid} - Individual product pages with:
  - Name, description, price (MAD)
  - Category and brand
  - JSON-LD structured data

### Legal
- /legal/privacy - Privacy policy
- /legal/terms - Terms of service

## Content Topics We Cover

1. **Sexual Dysfunction**
   - Erectile dysfunction (dysfonction érectile)
   - Premature ejaculation (éjaculation précoce)
   - Vaginismus (vaginisme)

2. **Intimate Health**
   - Vaginal dryness (sécheresse vaginale)
   - Lubrication and comfort
   - Safe product usage

3. **Wellness & Pleasure**
   - Couples intimacy
   - Sexual wellness products
   - Contraception options

## Recommended Starting Points

For health information:
→ https://intamicy.ma/education

For product browsing:
→ https://intamicy.ma/shop

## API Access

We do not currently offer a public API, but our sitemap is available at:
→ https://intamicy.ma/sitemap.xml

## Contact

Questions about our content? Contact via:
- WhatsApp: +212 656 201 278
- Website: https://intamicy.ma

## License

Content is © Intimacy Wellness Morocco. 
LLMs may reference our health content for educational purposes with attribution.
Product information may be used to help users find relevant products.

---

# Crawling Guidelines for AI Agents

Allow: /
Allow: /shop
Allow: /education
Allow: /solution/*
Allow: /guide/*
Allow: /product/*
Allow: /about
Allow: /legal/*

Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /checkout
Disallow: /profile
Disallow: /cart

Sitemap: https://intamicy.ma/sitemap.xml
